code: const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL||'http://localhost:8000';export const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/"));if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Network response was not ok');}const data=await response.json();return data;}catch(error){console.error('There was a problem with the fetch operation:',error);}};export const postData=async data=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(backendUrl,"/order_confirmation"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(data)});if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Network response was not ok');}const result=await response.json();return result;}catch(error){console.error('Post data failed:',error);throw error;}};
